body_html:
Sooo I took a quick look at it (it's actually driving me crazy now) and I don't know where the problem is. or, actually I do: seems like inline_label is not recognised anymore for whatever reason. I'm not sure if it's a nested_form problem, because I had a rails 4.0.5 project with simple_form 3.0.2 and inline_label worked there with no problem, and inline_label doesn't seem to have changed much in simple_form 3.1.0rc1. I'm clueless 😭
The quick fix for now would be to add a "normal" label so that it looks like this, but it's quite ugly. (at least the text shows, though).

or maybe @carpodaster or @lislis have more of a clue?!

body:
Sooo I took a quick look at it (it's actually driving me crazy now) and I don't know where the problem is. or, actually I do: seems like `inline_label` is not recognised anymore for whatever reason. I'm not sure if it's a nested_form problem, because I had a rails 4.0.5 project with simple_form 3.0.2 and `inline_label` worked there with no problem, and `inline_label` doesn't seem to have changed much in simple_form 3.1.0rc1. I'm clueless :sob:  
The quick fix for now would be to add a "normal" label so that it looks like this, but it's quite ugly. (at least the text shows, though).

![screen shot 2015-02-19 at 20 51 23](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3143348/6274631/1fe189bc-b879-11e4-86f7-a35e2bb1b29f.png)

or maybe @carpodaster or @lislis have more of a clue?!
